div.head: 胎上衝心
div.div: a fetus rises and clashes with the heart

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: a fetus rises and clashes with the heart

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi shang chong xin 子上衝心 , a child rises and clashes with the heart. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 77: 療妊娠忽下血，胎上衝心，手足逆冷 , “To cure sudden discharge of blood during pregnancy, with the fetus rising and clashing with the heart , and the hands and feet affected by counterflow cold”. Tai shang qiang xin 胎上搶心 , a fetus rises and knocks at the heart [1]

Pathological Condition identical with zi shang chong xin 子上衝心 , a child rises and clashes with the heart. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 12: 胎上搶心，則悶絕欲死，冷汗自出，喘滿不食 , “When a fetus rises and knocks at the heart , then this results in heart-pressure and an interruption [of qi flow] bringing a person close to death. Cold sweat leaves the body spontaneously. [Patients] pant, have a feeling of fullness, and do not eat”.
